data.title: Children's day in Prague 2024
data.meta_description: Praguest covers every aspect of travelling and living in the city of thousand towers, Prague. It provides practical tips, useful information and news to the tho
data.text:
International Children's Day is celebrated on June 1 in the Czech republic. Its aim is to draw the public's attention to children´s rights and needs. Check out the list of social and sport events in Prague on the Children's Day 2024:

Children's Day in Tržnice (Holesovice market)

1.6. 2024 from 11 a.m. until 6 p.m.

Hall 13, Prague Market

Hall 13 will host a festival with a playful and educational programme that includes architecture, illustration and comics, creative and sports activities, workshop, workshop circus disciplines, theater performance, the PokéTour and the concert of "Bombarďák". A variety of activities will be prepared for children in age from 5 to 15 years. Entrance fee is 80 - 110 CZK.

https://www.facebook.com

Magical Children's Day at the Museum of Fantastic Illusions

1.6. 2024 from 10:00 a.m. - 9:00 p.m

Vodičkova 31, Prague 1

Visit the funniest museum in Prague - a fascinating world of optical illusions and 150 interactive fun exhibits. On Children's Day on Saturday, June 1, 2024, every child under 15 who comes from 9:00 a.m. to 10:00 a.m. will receive a free magic wand! The Museum of Fantastic Illusions is a world of incredible optical illusions, where you will become part of a captivating exhibition of fantastic optical illusions and large-format trick paintings. You will experience the magic of old times and learn the interesting secrets of optical illusions. A perfect experience for everyone regardless of age! Find out more at:

www.muzeumfantastickychiluzi.cz

Fun children's day in Majaland

2.6. 2024 from 10.00

Outdoor part of Majaland, Ke Kopanině 421

Program for children in Majaland offers a combination of endless fun on fantastic attractions as well as a unique opportunity to spend a fabulous day in the outdoor area of Majaland with Kofola mascots. Children will enjoy creative workshops, competitions and games with Jupik and try the new attractions, such as Albert's Flight, Paul's Traffic Playground, Mega Trampoline and Flying Wheels. The popular mascots Mája and Vilík will come to see the children. They will enjoy delicious ice cream and delicious coffee at the U Dizzy pastry shop. You can combine your visit with a program at Dinosauria Museum Prague.

pop.cz/majaland

Children's Day at The Playground

1.6. 2024 from 10.00

The Playground, Na Příkopě 14

The Playground, the largest family entertainment center in Prague, has prepared a special program for Saturday, June 1. On an area of 4,500 m2, you can visit the Arcade game room, the Lasergame arena and the unique Butterfly House, a tropical paradise with more than 500 live, flying butterflies, every day from 10:00 on the first floor. On the ground floor, a real Venetian carousel awaits you and a unique virtual reality that will absorb all your senses. On Children's Day, however, you can look forward to many other activities completely free of charge. During the popular challenge "guess the flavor of Pringles" you will taste both traditional and new flavors of the world's most famous potato chips. You can have your face painted in the style of Squishmallows, take a spatial imagination test with Ravensburger Junior and see lots of fairy tale characters! The Playground will be visited by the heroine Ladybug from the series Miraculous, with whom you will be able to meet in person and take pictures with throughout the day. To mark the release of the new film, you'll also meet Freya the rabbit from Sylvanian Families - a wonderful huggable opportunity. You'll also find some giant plushies from Nici and life-sized Marvel superhero statues around the store. As always, a reward awaits you for visiting individual locations!

https://theplayground.cz/

PokéTour in Shopping Center Letňany

1/6/2024 from 10:00 a.m. to 6:00 p.m

OC Letňany, Veselská 663, Prague 9

Discover the fascinating world of Pokémon in OC Letňany! Visitors of the center are treated to a fun-filled day where they can expand their card collection, learn and play the Pokémon TCG card game, and enjoy Pokémon competitions. Throughout the day, you can learn how to play the Pokémon TCG or play your first match under the guidance of an experienced trainer. At the Exchange you can trade cards or find new and old cards to add to your collection. Pokemon experts will teach you how to tell fake cards from real ones, verify the authenticity of your cards, and advise you on how to find out the value of cards. A children's corner will be prepared for the smallest visitors, where they can find coloring books with their favorite pokemons or a workshop for making pokeballs! During the day there will be a competition that will test your knowledge of the cards, the card game and the series. Brush up on your knowledge and increase your chances of winning one of the great prizes. You can also win in the raffle. A coupon with face painting is prepared for users of the Moje Letňany mobile application. Available to all iPhone and Android owners, the app allows customers to earn loyalty points for their purchases, which can later be exchanged for exceptional gifts and rewards.

https://www.oc-letnany.cz/

Fairy Tale Children's Day at Westfield Chodov

1.6. 2024 from 1 p.m

Roztylská 2321/19, Prague 11

Celebrate the holiday of all children with the popular Princess and the Pea on the summer terrace on the second floor of the Westfield Chodov shopping center. Visitors can expect a rich program full of competitions and entertainment, an autograph session by Lucie Vondráčková and other actors, and live music. Little princesses, princes and knights will be able to create their own crowns and swords in art workshops. The little ones can reach for coloring books or stamps, and during the afternoon, two workshops focused on upcycling are prepared for everyone, where those interested will be able to create, for example, their own practical bag for toys. There will also be a beautification corner, where little beauties can try on make-up and try to conjure up a hairstyle on the majestic princess head. The program also includes face painting with a fairy tale theme or building a castle out of bricks. Don't miss the ballroom dances and the practice of proper noble behavior. Children can test their skills in chivalry, sling shooting, target shooting or riding a wooden horse. You also have the opportunity to take pictures in a special fairytale photo corner and thus record this great family afternoon in the family album. A live band will play throughout the event. Free entry.

https://www.westfield.com/

Children's Day at Prague Castle

25.5. 2024 from 10.00 - 18.00

Royal Garden and Deer Moat

Children's Day at Prague Castle will offer a lot of fun and educational activities for all young and adult adventurers. In the Royal Garden, visitors will explore the magic of traditional folk crafts and lesser-known corners of the castle and will go back to the times of exuberant swordsmen, merry jugglers and brave legionnaires and enjoy a theater performance. In the Deer Moat, the soldiers of the Castle Guard, who will demonstrate their equipment and training. But there will also be Indians, merry-go-rounds and refreshments. A small reward awaits all young visitors, who collect stamps at various stations. Admission is free.

https://www.hrad.cz

Children's Day with Children and Youth Centers

25.5. 2024 from 10 a.m. to 6 p.m.

Meadow on Vypich, Na Vypichu 1a, Prague 6

A spectacular celebration of Children's Day with Children and Youth Centers will take place on the meadow Na Vypichu. The celebrations will include demonstrations of leisure activities, creative art workshops, sports and freestyle zone, theater performances and concerts. Free entry.

www.dendetipraha.cz

Children's Day with IZS

30.5. 2024 from 11 a.m. to 6 p.m

Park Přátelství - Prosek

The city district of Prague 9 cordially invites visitors to the Children's Day with IZS (Integrated Emergency Services) to Park Přátelství in Prosek. You can look forward to presentations of IZS components with practical demonstrations, a children's disco with a DJ, a rich accompanying program for children, prize competitions, art and hobby workshops, Pony Paradise, bouncy castle, performances by the Bombarďák group and refreshment stalls.

https://www.praha9.cz

Children's Day in Park Kampa

1.6. 2024 from 1 p.m. to 5 p.m.

Kampa Park

A full-day fun program for children with games, art workshops, performances by a children's string orchestra, a magic theater, a bouncy castle, face painting, a practical demonstration of first aid and refreshments will be held the first Thursday in June in Kampa park. Entry is free.

www.praha1.cz

Children's Day on Karlínské square - Greek fables and legends

2.6. 2024 from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m

On Sunday, June 2, 2024, you can go on an adventure to ancient Greece at Karlin square. If Zeus favors you, you will

handle all the pitfalls that await you along the way. Children can enjoy the bouncy castle, fairy tales and performances by the Karlín Spektrum as well as refreshments provided by Karlín Market. The event, organized by Karlínské Spektrum with Karlín Market, is free thanks to the support of the city of Prague.

https://ddmpraha.cz

Children's day at Prague 10

01.06.2024 14:00 - 17:00

park Malinová - Chrpová, Zahradní Město

The traditional celebration of Children's Day in the Malinová - Chrpová park in Zahradní město will bring an afternoon full of

creative workshops and sports activities. Children will be able to decorate flower pots, plant flowers in them or create a bookmark for a holiday book. Children who like to move can spin a diabolo, get to know rugby, keep 4 balls in the air, walk on stilts or hit rings and balls at the target, all under the guidance of experienced instructors. The local K2 Family Center will present its activities. At 3:00 p.m., a humorous and informative performance by the Studna Theater called Fables takes place.

https://praha10.cz/

Children's Day in Vyšehrad

30.05. 2024 from 10 a.m. - 6 p.m.

Vyšehrad, V Pevnosti 159 / 5b, Prague 2

The National Cultural Monument Vyšehrad invites the youngest visitors to enjoy a program full of fun and surprises in front of the Old Burgrave's House. During celebrations children can watch three fairy-tale performances for different age groups and a concert by the band "Kůzle" for everybody!. The accompanying programme "Puppen place" is available free of charge from 2 p.m. to 5 p.m. Admission to outdoor events is voluntary. For capacity reasons, it is necessary to purchase tickets for theatre performances that take place indoors.

https://www.praha-vysehrad.cz/

Children's Day - With animals in a fairy tale at Klamovka

30.05. from 3 p.m. - 5 p.m.

Klamovka Club and the Klamovka Park

The Klamovka club invites children to enjoy a varied afternoon program, which includes a theater performance (15:00-16:00) and games, competitions and creative stations in the Klamovka park (16:00-17:00). Entry to the event is free for all children, accompanying adults only pay a reservation fee for the theater performance (80 CZK/person). A reservation is not required for the outdoor game. Reservation is required for theater performances due to capacity reasons.

www.ddmpraha.cz

Children's Day at Chodov Fortress

1. 6. 2024 from 3 p.m. - 7 p.m.

Park near Chodov Fortress, Ledvinova 9, Prague 4

The park near Chodov Fortress will host a celebration of children´s day - fun afternoon full of games, traditional fair, art workshops, and a theater performance. Free entry.

www.chodovskatvrz.cz

Children's Day in Žofín

31.5.2024 from 09:00 - 12:00

Žofín, Slovansky island

Children's Day will take place in Žofín Island in the morning. The program includes "Sváťovo" theatre, sports games, animation team "Vláček" or the fairy-tale dragon.

https://www.praha1.cz/udalosti/den-deti-na-zofine/

Summer games on Frantisek Sports Complex

31.5.2024 from 14:00 to 17:00

The summer games na Františku will offer children and teenagers athletics, mini golf, basketball, floorball, climbing, rowing or a surfing simulator. For schools, the complex will be open from 8:30 a.m. to 2:00 p.m., for the public from 2:00 p.m. to 5:00 p.m.

https://www.praha1.cz/udalosti/letni-hry-na-frantisku/

Nusle to the children

1.6. 2024 from 10:00 - 16:00

park behind ZŠ Křesomyslova

The association "Probuďme Nusle" prepared a sporting, fun and educational day for families with children of all categories. From 11 a.m. to 3 p.m., there will be Nusle "miniBlesky" and unique flea concept. On the program are all dance performances, theater and a puppet show, parkour exhibitions, workshops, workshops... Free entry.

https://nusledetem.cz/

Children's Day at the Station of Young Naturalists or Flight through the game world in seven decades

1. 6. 2024 from 10 a.m. - 4 p.m.

Drtinova 1a, Praha 5 - Smíchov

In June, the Natural Sciences Station not only celebrates its 70th birthday, but also the traditional "Children's Day" in the spirit of the games the children played over the past 70 years. Not only are they invited to the celebration children, but also their parents and grandparents, in short, everyone who hasn't forgotten to play. Free admission. Find out more on the website.

www.facebook.com/Staniceprirodovedcu

Children's Day - Kotlářka Olympic Games

31.05.2024 from 16:00-19:00

Stadion mládeže, Prague 6

The Youth Stadium, the Station of Technicians and the Zmrzlík Equestrian Center invite you to the Children's Day - Olympic Games Kotlářka 2024. Do you want to know and, above all, experience how this year's Olympic Games in Paris will take place? Just arrive on Friday 31 May 2024 between 4:00 p.m. and 5 p.m. at the Youth Stadium in Prague 6. The event ends at 7 p.m.

https://ddmpraha.cz/

Children's Day in Ulita

01.06.2024 from 2 p.m. - 6 p.m.

DDM Prague 3 - building of Ulita Na Balkáně 17a

Ulita will turn into a magical place where lots of great fun awaits children locations, excellent refreshments, fun tasks, great music, competitions, puzzles and of course surprises. We give space to all our emotions and spin with them. Entry is free for everyone and there is no need to register for the event in advance.

www.ulita.cz

Prague Railway Day - Children's Day

1. 6. 2024 od 9:30–17:00

Train railway station - Praha-Vršovice

ROPID, the national transport company the Czech Railways a.s. and Dopravní podnik hl. m. Prahy a.s. invite all children to

enjoy a traditional popular event, the International Children's Day at the Prague-Vrsovice train station.

https://pid.cz/rdz-vrsovice-2024/

Children's Day at Dolní Počernice

9.6. 2024 from 1 p.m. (The event was moved from the original date of 2.6 to Sunday 9.6. 2024)

Castle Park, Prague Dolní Počernice

The castle park in Dolní Počernice will once again host the celebrations of Children's Day. The program includes skill

competitions, sports tasks, attractions and theater performances. All children, who complete all tasks, will be rewarded.

praha-dolnipocernice.cz

Children's Day in Park Zahrádky

15.6.2024 from 10.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m

Park Zahrádky

The municipal district of Prague 9 invites visitors for a celebration of a Children's Day celebration to Park Zahrádky on 15 June 2024. The program includes competitions for young and older children, sports activities with Praga Rugby, art workshops, face painting, DJ, a fairy tale, concept of the Péro behind the hat band, pony paradise, bouncy castle and refreshments.

https://www.praha9.cz/den-deti-v-parku-zahradky

Events held on Children's Day 2024 can also be found in the "What´s on section".

Interesting tips and best places for children in Prague can be found in the "Prague for kids".
